about_the_game:
I wish Michael Phantomino were here - is a narrative puzzle game about a cute pink ghost who comes to the rescue of all his friends.

By constantly playing his favorite puzzle, Michael has become a Master Solver. He has learned the essence of all things, and now he can solve anything, whether it's making a delicious pie or healing a broken heart.

Rotate and flip the pieces to place them on the field and move through the story. Enjoy the process and the result.

  • Great for beginner gamers
  • Adjustable puzzle difficulty
  • Sounds and music are an integral part of the mood of each level
  • Mouse, keyboard, gamepad: you can play the way you like!
  • intuitive UI makes it easy to master, even for beginners

The game is still in development so please look forward to future announcements!

Everything is solvable!
